articles.description: KR Choksey is bullish on Tata Consultancy Services has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 3915 in its research report dated July 14, 2023.
articles.content:
KR Choksey's research report on Tata Consultancy Services

articles.title: F&O Tracker: Bullish Outlook for Nifty 50, Cautious Approach for Bank Nifty - BusinessLine
articles.description: Nifty 50 showed positive momentum with fresh long build-ups and a breakout, indicating further upside potential. Bullish sentiment is reflected in the options data and chart patterns. Traders can consider bullish strategies such as going long on Nifty futures…
